divs: Sighting DetailsI was out on the padio haveing a cup of coffie and a cigeret as i do every morning, we dont smoke in the house.Then I saw a flash in the sky and looked up right away thinking it was a shooting star,but it was just a bright light setting there, then it started to pull away untill it was out of sight, not sideways like a plane, put straight out tword space. I sat there wandering what I just saw,was it a star dissapering in the lightining of the morning sky? no that takes quite a few mins this only took a few seconds, And I could still see all the other stars that werent as pright as that one was.ok was it a nova? well maybe but it just seemed closer than a star as I watched it pull away.Well last resort was it a UFO? I dont know maybe. I sat there and lit another smoke and pondered over the options and I have no idea what I saw that morning. So was there a nova on the 29 or 30th of Jan. at 7am or did I see a UFO, it was no plane or a star, let me know if theres a missing star sence that morning.
Summary: I saw a flash and looked up and saw a light and watched it slowly pull straight away till out of sight.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Andover
There was one other sighting in Andover on or around January 30th 2009
